sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ea4fbf57998110107f4449fb75a7f6c6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</consumes><consumes_customized>true</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Receive Status</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {






    var responseBody = JSON.stringify(request.queryParams.Body).replace(/["]+/g, '');


    var start_index = responseBody.indexOf("INC");

    // parsing incident number
    var inc_number = responseBody.substr(start_index, 10);

    var body = responseBody.substring(parseInt(responseBody.indexOf(",")) + 1, parseInt(responseBody.lastIndexOf(']')));



    var inputs = {};
    inputs['number'] = inc_number;
    inputs['body'] = body; // Object 


    var outputs = sn_fd.FlowAPI.executeSubflow('x_snc_whatsapp_twi.inbound_whatsapp', inputs);


    var output = outputs['output'];





})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_snc_whatsapp_twi/whatsapp_twilio</operation_uri><produces>application/x-www-form-urlencoded</produces><produces_customized>true</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-02 21:09:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>ea4fbf57998110107f4449fb75a7f6c6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>79</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Receive Status</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Whatsapp-Twillio " source="x_snc_whatsapp_twi">a5ba6bdb994110107f4449fb75a7f671</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Whatsapp-Twillio ">a5ba6bdb994110107f4449fb75a7f671</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ea4fbf57998110107f4449fb75a7f6c6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-17 09:34:07</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="WhatsApp-Twilio">632f7f57998110107f4449fb75a7f679</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_whatsapp_twi.WhatsAppTwilio</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>WhatsAppTwilio</name><script><![CDATA[var WhatsAppTwilio = Class.create();
WhatsAppTwilio.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    errorHandling: function(inputs, outputs) {

        if (inputs.status_code != 201) {
            if (inputs.status_code == 401) {
                outputs.error_message = "Invalid credentials";
            } else {
                outputs.error_message = JSON.parse(inputs.response_body).message;
            }
            outputs.status = "Error";
        } else {
            outputs.status = "Success";
        }

    },
	
	getTextBody: function(request, trim) {
        var reqBodyLine;
        var reqBodyString = '';
        var streamBody = request.body.dataStream;
        var gtrRequestBodyReader = new GlideTextReader(streamBody);
        
        //get first line
        reqBodyLine = gtrRequestBodyReader.readLine();
        while(typeof reqBodyLine == 'string') {
            reqBodyString += reqBodyLine + '\n';
            
            //get next line
            reqBodyLine = gtrRequestBodyReader.readLine();
        }
	return trim ? reqBodyString.trim() : reqBodyString;
	},
	
	
        
    type: 'WhatsAppTwilio'
